locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Ok truck stop. Laundry an shower were ok. Plenty of hot water. Lost my white cat here. Slept with windows partially down. Woke up about 3 am and my cat was gone. She liked to lay on the dash or sit on the side doors watching everything. No …

… counter just stared at me, did not speak. I then gave him a smile and he still looked at me crazy. Then I waiting on a shower for a  couple of hours. So, I went in to see what the problem was. Again when I walked in the first man and …

Nice and big truck stop. But in shower floor did not sweep properly. Lots of lose hair all over in the shower. Even temperature was very low too inside the shower. About cleanliness this is one of the worst showers I saw at Love’s truck …

My husband and I have been going to loves over the years during our travels to use their showers. We always get a team shower which cost 17$. Randall the manager (who tried to charge us 34$) told us that “we have been getting away with that …

… look. I said can I get a shower he rung it up on the register and pointed to the rewards scanner and walked away to ring it in the the other computer barely turned around and said the door is open and balled up the shower slip. I looked …
Shower no clean hair on floor all over easily seeable and yes shower was just cleaned lol.
Hi  professional  driver this is the bad love truck stop in us the have bad behavior what driver is whating 1 hours only for shower
Overall, it is a new truck stop. However, the shower cleaning leaves a big room for improvement.
The kids they have working is to busy playing they left they keys that unlocks all the shower doors and everything they left laying in the laundry room I know because I did laundry omg
They need to get boltlocks on those shower doors.. I walked in on a dude taking a shower I was assigned to and then someone walked in on me later. Smh

locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: So I had a pleasant experience at this Petro. I do prefer them over Ta. I fuel and shower at loves usually but I needed to do a Pm and some other stuff and I don’t use loves for that anymore. …

… which way you want to fall of your bed lol. Store was beat and clean, service providers where in point with greeting abs friendliness. Showers where clean pressure of water was awesome. But….. there is visible mold in the shower, like …

The remodel in the showers gives new meaning to "water closet". Extremely small, terrible ventilation (floors, walls, everything's wet when you're done). Had to step into the shower to open the door to get out.

Very disappointed, my husband and I went to shower and wanted a plate to go from the deli , unfortunately there was a young big lady who refused service to my husband , maybe because he’s Hispanic and before us to an Asian gentleman, we had …

… pumps aren't working. The fuel islands are pretty dirty, and poorly maintained. The showers are pretty clean, but very very hot and humid. You'll be just as sweaty and nasty after your shower as you were before your shower. Not a lot of …

… always a plus. On the other hand, there may be a reason for that. My husband and I decided to take a shower here because we had a lot of time on the load we were under. The showers were very small, and not updated at all. They may have been …

… open another room to use never seen something so lame as this.  Handicapped people have to use it. JUST STUPID.  Ok maybe I was harsh she was just doing her job well. Nice person but still don't clean it without open one shower bathroom.

… Took a shower team shower, was put into a tiny shower than was older than dirt with the old TINEY shower stall with a door that one person could barely turn around in the whole unit let alone two. Switched us to the handicapped shower where …

My wife and I are team truck drivers so we share a shower. The shower was so small both of us barely fit. The restaurant closed the buffet early did not put out a breakfast buffet ended up ordering chicken tenders. Took FOREVER.  The only …
… Good space for dog to chill out.  I actually didn't do much inside except get a shower.  Shower here were clean and no wait.

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Food isn't that good? And the parking lot isn't designed for trucks in my work. Good if you're a fish.
I guess it's nice to have a shower. But the parking lot makes life difficult to fuel. Or to even park or weigh the truck.

$17 for a shower? That's outrageous! Even if I had that kind of money, I still wouldn't pay that much. I wish I would've got told that on the phone before I wasted the gas coming out here from off Clinton Highway earlier

Stayed her for the night, got up 5:00am to go in and take a shower. Tried getting a shower were told that there were no showers because there was no one to clean them. At this time 2 women were standing behind the counter. Went to use the …

… here have been a very bad experience, today 4/7/24 has been terrible at 5 pm I went to take a shower and after 2 hours waiting the employee left. cleaning, and the bathrooms were left uncleaned, the administrator told me that until …
my second shower here everything looks good and clean but the water warm and sometime comes little warm
11-18-22 One employee working overnight and absolutely no showers for truck drivers because one employee can’t watch the front and clean showers at the same time. …

Men's bathroom was mess., Each toilet clogged and dirty.
Asked the cashier for a restroom in the shower, didn't bother accommodating. Poor cleaning service and very poor hospitality for your driver

We had a great experience here. We had a great shower in a clean place, parking was pretty decent, but most of all the service was awesome! We had a shampoo bottle explode in our shower bag, and they were nice enough to let us borrow the …
Fairly decent store, but ordered a shower and toilet seat clearly wasn't wiped down, cause there was dried up piss on the seat.  Do better.

… are both have such positive attitudes, and are extremely customer oriented.  Also the shower had good water pressure, plenty of hot water, and was exceptionally clean.  Although it's not on my approved fueling stops, any time I am …

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: We stopped in,we were tired from the road. We needed a shower . The ladies who waited on us were very nice.  We got two showers . We bought one and got the other free.  The shower had hot water , clean towels. I liked that it had a blow …
A Great Place Too Take A Shower and Break While Out On The Road = Food Is All So Good
… Literally at the time all the trucks are coming in for the night! So thank you very much! And be nice to clean the shower heads every once in a while pressure sucks beyond anything. But hey thanks!
Some one work in TA really nice. After I shower. I forgot phone . They keep it and give back to me. Thank you ❤️
It's typical ta plus point are  big parking lot .food court no waiting for showers. But management is slappy .I used a shower here.
One of the cleanest showers for truckers. Only downfall is that the shower is a little small. Friendly employees and very helpful.

Don't why I stop here. Always something wrong w the fuel or def. Finally last night the fuel was working only to get up this morning 2 hours earlier than I need to for a shower. No showers? U would think I would have learned  by now.
Good place to park and shower need a real restaurant so tired of all the truck stops thinking we don't deserve to have a good meal and only want junk food
Always like stopping here to fuel,shower and eat.

Tao TaoLocal Guide · 12 reviews · 12 photos2 years ago No shower.Like1 Share Response from the owner 2 years agoHey Tao, we're sorry to see that the shower wasn't available during your visit. We would like to address any concerns you might have directly, so please contact us at https://www.ta-petro.com/contact/ so that we can look into any issues you … More

locations.title: Lee's Travel Center
locations.content: Lee's Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Cost effective fueling, a drink and a shower is offered. Beyond that, the men's restroom is terrible. 1 of 2 toilet functions. It's just nasty. No toilet paper in either stall. No out of service tag for toilets.
It's always a nice experience coming here. The staff is pleasant, and if you're looking for a cheap shower that's not $15.00 a person, I recommend this place.

… you must pay to park (there is a sign telling you to download RigPark) and if parking is NOT paid for you will be booked and towed at owners expense. If I'm paying to park, there better be a shower available in the establishment as well.

showerReviews.reviewText: Big clean shower for drivers..

… My wife, her 2 fully task trained service dogs and I have stopped in here 3 times and showered no issues. We never cause any problems, neither have my wife’s service dogs, we talked with the GM about my wife’s service dogs before and he …

… lot and kept travel in the next day. It’s really nice because you can get up in the morning after sleeping in a vehicle all night and go in and have a shower if you want and a hot meal. The bathrooms are clean and the service is good. …

… get truck in and out of. Very small and tight parking also. No hot food. Tired of seeing subway everywhere. Shower was nice and clean, towels didn’t smell fresh though. Typical Pilot. Nothing exciting. Wish they had bean to cup coffee …

… for the night. Upon arrival my husband went inside to use the restroom. Afterwards, we both entered the store to shower.  the showers were clean but very small.  Later in the evening, we sat in the truck making sandwiches so hubs went …

After a long drive went inside to get a shower guess what she said they all down she says low pressure.. yea right’’ instead fixing the problem they on the phone watching videos and making fun they should be all fired specially management …
Niki is/was very helpful to find My shower log in number, and she has a pretty smile.

This truck stop is big.

But unfortunately the toilet seat in my shower was not cleaned.
It was clean,nice,friendly yes the shower was also very clean......
Showering here is the best shower’s are spotless
